title: Councilors' Fane
text:
Second only in grandeur to the temple inside the [[Ascended Plaza]], this temple is
open to any in the city of [[Shae Mordai]] who wish to honor the [[Undying Court]] or other ancestors. Priests hold regular devotional rites here. Itâ€™s also the primary place in which the living, other than priests and the [[Sibling Kings]], can meet with a member of
the [[Undying Court]].
